content: this pattern was designed whilst i was watching my nephew on a uk quiz programme on channel 4 called countdown i started it the first day he was on and finished on the last day so it s only fitting that i name it after a feature in the programme - the conundrum it s a simple construction whereby you will knit with an increase until you have used half of your yarn then start to decrease i did the first one in a 4 ply yarn and that seemed to work really well but if you feel that the centre is not wide enough or too wide then it s easy enough to adjust the amount of stitches to increase to my second one is made from a dk yarn and i only needed to increase to around 30 stitches for this one it s knit up really nicely and i feel it holds the pattern a bit nicer gauge isn t really important nor is size it s just to whatever you think fits you best
